sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Cart from './Cart' import TabSlider from './TabSlider'; import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; import axios from 'axios'; import { selectListRooms } from '../../redux/actions/listRoomActions'; import SearchProduct from './SearchProduct'; import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; import { toast } from "react-toastify"; const BaseURL = "https://localhost:44336/api/Home/"; function Header() { const history = useHistory(); const dataUser = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("info_user")); const map = useSelector(state => state.user.user) console.log(map) const dispatch = useDispatch(); const fetchListRooms = async () => { const response = await axios.get(BaseURL + "GetListSanPhamLoai") .catch((err) => console.log(err)); dispatch(selectListRooms(response.data)); }; const LogoutUser = () => { history.push("/") window.localStorage.removeItem('info_user'); toast.success(`Đăng xuất thành công`, { position: "top-right", }); userMap() window.location = "" } const userMap = () => { return (
{ dataUser === null ? <>
Đăng nhập
Đăng ký
: <>
}
); } useEffect(() => { fetchListRooms(); userMap(); }, []); return (
{/* header left mobie */}
{/* menu left */}
{/* logo */}
{/* menu right */}
{/* search */}
3
Organic Strawberry Fruits
2 x £28.98
Total: £92.96
View Cart Checkout
{/* header desktop */}
{/* menu */}
  • Trang Chủ
  • Giới Thiệu
  • Sản Phẩm
  • Liên Hệ
{/* logo */}
{/* search */}
{dataUser === null ? "" : dataUser.hoTen}
{userMap()}
); } export default Header;
